title: After hurricane Matthew the counties said they would pick up debris and we are still waiting over in the Rocky Point area especially in Willows Bay Development...what can be done about picking up the trees etc along road and in sub division
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/01/is-pender-county-still-picking-up-debris-along-the-roads-from-hurricane-matthew/
